summary: Completed truth lemma imp case (both directions) via mutual induction restructuring. Added helper lemmas neg_imp_fst and neg_imp_snd for extracting formulas from negated implications. Box case documented as architectural limitation due to universal quantification over all histories. Lake build succeeds.
